title: Cool Restaurants Persecuting GOP? Tom Arnold Won’t Save Us 6.25.18
itunes:title: Cool Restaurants Persecuting GOP? Tom Arnold Won’t Save Us 6.25.18
description:
In episode 176, Jack and special guest co-host Dani Fernandez are joined by Yo Is This Racist's Andrew Ti to discuss Netflix firing their PR chief for using the N-word, ABC's reboot of Roseanne called 'The Connors,' Sarah Huckabee Sanders being kicked out of a restaurant, Permit Patty calling the police on an eight year old for selling water, Tom Arnold taking on the Trump administration, a look at the box office from this past weekend, a world update, and more! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
